source.sqlReaderQuery:
with item as 
(
SELECT  
[No_],
[No_ 2],
replace(replace([Description],',', ' '), '"', ' ') as [Description],
replace(replace([Description 2],',', ' '), '"', ' ') as [Description 2],
[Base Unit of Measure],
[Item Category Code],
[Product Group Code],
[Selling Price],
[Pack Size Information],
[Pack Size],
[2Way Item],
[Short Name],
[Pack Title],
[Pack Group Code],
[Jar Deposit],
[Pcs Per Case],
[Item Class],
[Packaging Type],
[Container Type],
[Sub Brand],
[SKU Category],
'10001' as Site_Code,
'ANDHRA PRADESH' as Site_Name
FROM [dbo].[BIPL - ANDHRA PRADESH$Item]

UNION ALL
SELECT  
[No_],
[No_ 2],
replace(replace([Description],',', ' '), '"', ' ') as [Description],
replace(replace([Description 2],',', ' '), '"', ' ') as [Description 2],
[Base Unit of Measure],
[Item Category Code],
[Product Group Code],
[Selling Price],

[2Way Item],

[Pcs Per Case],
[Item Class],
